Highlights.name: Ecosystem to support entrepreneur improve their business & management.
Highlights.description: All businesses need to achieve excellent business process through the best management practices. They receive assistance and guidance along the way from Proxsis & Co consulting team. Proxsis & Co is one of the largest consulting firms in Indonesia.

Highlights.name: Ecosystem to support entrepreneur with Investment & Incubation
Highlights.description: •Funding for Early stage, Scale up and business Financing •Incubation for early stage business •Business support services •Collaborate with other financial institution for a strong support

Highlights.name: Ecosystem to help founders focus more on core processes.
Highlights.description: HR Managed Services, Digital Marketing, Sales & Lead Generation, Accounting Services, GA & Executive Support, IT Managed Service, IT Infrastructure & Cyber Security Service

enhanced_description: PROXSIS Consulting Group is a leading business solutions and management system consulting firm in Indonesia, comprised of dozens of value-added business solutions, consulting, and IT companies. They offer an ecosystem of support for businesses and entrepreneurs, including consulting for business and management improvement, investment and incubation services, and managed services for core processes like HR, Digital Marketing, Sales & Lead Generation, Accounting, GA & Executive Support, IT Managed Services, IT Infrastructure & Cyber Security. PROXSIS operates on a 'Result Only Working Environmental' principle and has assisted over 1000 companies in Indonesia, including Fortune 500 enterprises. They also offer an ISO & HSE center and provide different platforms for various services.
key_use_cases: Investment and Incubation for businesses (early stage, scale-up, financing)
Accelerating Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Building a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
ISO (International Organization for Standardization) Compliance Consulting
